description:
Mashiro’s parents are finally returning from overseas for a visit, so Sora and the gang go to the airport to pick them up. While exploring the airport, they meet a girl named Shoko who knows a lot about airplanes.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Take Off! Hikouki de Tsunagaru Omoi
Take Off! Memories Connected by Airplanes
テイクオフ! 飛行機でつながる想い
